parts.name: GMC Sierra / Chevy Silverado Bed Swap (GMT800/GMT900)
parts.description: The pickup beds are physically interchangeable between GMC Sierra and Chevy Silverado of the same generation and bed length (Short/Standard/Long). However, the taillights and outer bed skins have different styling lines.
specs: Direct Bolt-on
Fuel filler neck location matches
Wiring harness for taillights may differ slightly

parts.name: GMC Yukon / Chevy Tahoe Front Clip Swap
parts.description: You can swap the entire front clip (fenders, hood, grille, bumper, headlights) between GMC Yukon and Chevy Tahoe/Suburban of the same generation. This is popular for giving a Chevy the 'GMC Denali' look or vice versa.
specs: Requires swapping all front body panels together
Core support is usually the same
Wiring for headlights may need modification

parts.name: GMC Envoy / Chevy Trailblazer 4.2L Atlas Engine
parts.description: The Vortec 4200 (LL8) Inline-6 engine is identical between the GMC Envoy, Chevy Trailblazer, Buick Rainier, Oldsmobile Bravada, Isuzu Ascender, and Saab 9-7X. Long block is interchangeable.
specs: Engine Code: LL8
Oil pans may differ for 4WD vs 2WD
Later years (2006+) have different reluctor wheels/sensors

parts.name: GMC Canyon / Chevy Colorado Doors (1st Gen)
parts.description: Doors are fully interchangeable between the first generation GMC Canyon, Chevy Colorado, and Isuzu i-Series trucks.
specs: Front doors fit all cab configurations
Rear doors specific to Crew Cab or Extended Cab
Interior panels may have different trim

parts.name: GMC Savana / Chevy Express Bumpers
parts.description: Front and rear bumpers are interchangeable between GMC Savana and Chevy Express vans. The front bumper style changed in 2003 but mounts are similar.
specs: 1996-2002 bumpers interchange
2003-Present bumpers interchange
Rear bumpers fit all years 1996-Present

parts.name: GMC Acadia / Chevy Traverse Suspension Components
parts.description: Control arms, struts, shocks, and sway bars are largely interchangeable between the Lambda platform vehicles: GMC Acadia, Chevy Traverse, Buick Enclave, and Saturn Outlook.
specs: Platform: GM Lambda
Check specific part numbers for spring rates (tuning differences)
Hard parts (arms, knuckles) are identical

parts.name: GMC Terrain / Chevy Equinox Interior Parts
parts.description: Many interior components like seats (frames), window switches, center console internals, and carpet are shared between the GMC Terrain and Chevy Equinox (Theta platform).
specs: Dashboards are different
Door panels are different
Seats bolt in but may have different fabric/leather patterns
